name: expansible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to increase or be increased in size or amount: He wore a large wristwatch with an expansible strap. The bicycle tyre consists of a hollow, expansible tube, with a solid, non-expansible cover. Synonym
expandableRelated word
expand
More examplesFewer examplesThe soil tends to crack because of the expansible clay minerals it contains.Her heart valve was repaired using an expansible metal ring.The amount of healthcare spending needed is almost infinitely expansible.The results of the experiment are not expansible because of the small sample size.Digital goods such as music are infinitely expansible, because their quantity can be increased at very little cost.
